entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
